item.title: Maryland Taps Affordable Care Act Fund To Help Pay for Abortion Care
item.description: The state is using an old source of funding to pay for a new money crunch: assisting out-of-state patients with the costs associated with abortion.

item.title: Breaking Down Why Medicare Part D Premiums Are Likely To Go Up
item.description: Insurers will take drug costs, frequency of use, and other factors into account as they set premium amounts for the 2026 plan year.

item.title: ‘Alternative Facts’ Aren’t a Reason To Skip Vaccines
item.description: Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s decision to defund mRNA research is just the latest to put ideology above public health.
